metadata.title: CVE-2024-1495 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 13.1 prior to 16.10.7, starting from 16.11 prior to 16.11.4,and starting from 17.0 prior to 17.0.2. It was possible for an attacker tocause a denial of service using maliciously crafted file.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
